price: 6. Tada tikrai, Mes apklausime tuos (žmones), kuriems tai (Knyga) buvo siųsta ir tikrai, Mes apklausime Pasiuntinius.
arabic: فَلَنَسۡـَٔلَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أُرۡسِلَ إِلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَنَسۡـَٔلَنَّ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: falanasalanna alladhīna ur'sila ilayhim walanasalanna al-mur'salīna
